column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////On our hotel concierge's recommendation ordered a thin crust cheese pizza and a spinach salad. First of all I was told it would take an hour for the delivery and our hotel was around the corner! Secondly when it did arrive about an hour ten minutes later
column3: the crust hard and dry and just plain awful! For a restaurant that boasts about it's pizza this was one of the worst pizzas we have ever had. Never again! The salad was ok.
